errors.generic: Virhe on tapahtunut. Jos virhe jatkuu, liity support palvelimelle.
errors.unknownChannel: Tuntematon kanava. Jos kanava on oikea, varmista että minulla on käyttöoikeus lukea sitä.
errors.unknownRole: Tuntematon rooli. Varmista että rooli on olemassa.
errors.missingPermissionChannelRead: Minulta puuttuu käyttöoikeudet `Luetut viestit` ja/tai `Lue viestihistoriaa` aktiivisella kanavalla.
errors.missingPermissionChannelReaction: Minulta puuttuu käyttöoikeudet 'Lisää reaktioita' ja/tai 'Lue viestihistoriaa' aktiivisella kanavalla.
errors.missingPermissionChannelSend: Minulta puuttuu 'Lähetä viestejä' käyttöoikeus aktiivisela kanavalla.
errors.unknownMessageID: Tuntematon viesti. Varmista että viestin tunniste on oikea.
errors.setChannel: Aseta ensin kanava, kokeile sen jälkeen tätä komentoa uudestaan.
errors.setChannelOrMessage: Aseta ensin kanava ja haluamasi viesti, kokeile sen jälkeen tätä komentoa uudestaan.
errors.usedEmoji: $pair parissa kaytetty emoji on jo käytössä tässä viestissä.
errors.usedRole: $pair parissa kaytetty rooli on jo käytössä tässä viestissä.
errors.unknownMessage: Aktiivinen viesti on tuntematon, tarkista käyttöoikeuteni ja varmista että viesti on yhä olemassa.
errors.unknownEmoji: En voi käyttää tuota emojia. Jos se on custom emoji, varmistathan että minä voin käyttää sitä
errors.suggestionRead: Unable to get the suggestion $suggestion in <#$channel>. Please make sure I have the permission `Read Messages` in the channel, and that the suggestion wasn't deleted.
errors.suggestionSend: Unable to send the suggestion to $channel. Please make sure I have the permissions `Read Messages`, `Send Messages`, and `Embed Links` in the channel.
errors.maxReactions: Tässä viestissä on 20 reaktioita. Se on Discordin asettama rajoitus. Lisää ja aseta toinen viesti lisätäksesi reaktio rooleja.

footer: ** HUOMIOI: ** Roolin ”Zira” on oltava ylempänä kuin rooli(t) joita yrität antaa, ja tarvitsee oikeuden `Muokkaa Rooleja` antaakseen roolin heille.
userPermissions: Et voi käyttää tätä komentoa, koska sinulta puuttuu seuraavat käyttöoikeude(t):

message.help: Aseta aktiivinen viesti tai lähetä viesti aktiiviselle kanavalle.

add.description: You can add multiple roles at once by providing more emojis and roles. You have to use a comma to separate each pair, see below for an example.

list.help: List all roles that have been setup.
list.title: $name | Rooli Lista
list.name: ** Nimi: **

boardNotFound.title: Taulua ei löydy
boardNotFound.description: I was unable to find that board. Please make sure you have the right board ID, and that you have added **`ZiraDiscord`** to the board.

dm.success:
To verify this board, please create a card that has the title set to the ID that has been sent to you. After you have done this, please type `done` in this channel to continue the setup.

You will have 5 minutes to do this.
dm.error: I was unable to send you the verification DM. Please make sure I can send you a DM.

trello.noCard: Unable to find the card. Please try again.
trello.validList: That is not a valid list. Please input a valid list ID.
trello.pickNew: Type the corresponding number to pick a list, or `none` to not pick a list for new suggestions.
trello.pickNewTitle: Pick a List for New Suggestions
trello.pickApprove: Type the corresponding number to pick a list, or `none` to not pick a list for approved suggestions.
trello.pickApproveTitle: Pick a List for Approved Suggestions
trello.pickDenied: Type the corresponding number to pick a list, or `none` to not pick a list for denied suggestions.
trello.pickDeniedTitle: Pick a List for Denied Suggestions
trello.pickPotential: Type the corresponding number to pick a list, or `none` to not pick a list for potential suggestions.
trello.pickPotentialTitle: Pick a List for Potential Suggestions
trello.pickInvalid: Type the corresponding number to pick a list, or `none` to not pick a list for invalid suggestions.
trello.pickInvalidTitle: Pick a List for Invalid Suggestions

role.disable: Anyone with the correct permissions can use Zira's commands now
role.success: Nyt, vain palvelimen omistaja ja henkilöt kenellä on $role rooli voi käyttä Ziran komentoja.

main.name: role <role | disable>
main.value: Set or remove which role can use commands.

edit.help: Edit a message sent by Zira in the active channel.
edit.owner: That message has not been sent by me.

toggle.help: Add toggled role(s) to the active message.
toggle.limit: You have reached the limit of 6 toggled roles. You can get unlimited toggled roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)
toggle.over: Adding these will result in you reaching the limit of toggled roles. You can get unlimited toggled and remove roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)

once.help: Added role(s) to the active message that can only be received once.

multi.help: Added an emoji that will give multiple roles to the active message.
multi.params: <emoji><roolin nimi | rooli maininta>,<roolin nimi | rooli maininta>
multi.usedEmoji: That emoji is already in use on this message.

delete.help: Remove roles that have been setup.
delete.noRoles: No roles are set on that message.
delete.good: All roles exist, none were removed.
delete.message: Unable to remove the role as it wasn't on the specified message.

autorole.title: Auto rooli
autorole.user:
Add a role that should be given when a user joins.

To remove a role being used in autorole, just do the command again.
autorole.userRemove: $role will no longer be given when a user joins.
autorole.bot:
Add a role that should be given when a bot joins.

To remove a role being used in autorole, just do the command again.
autorole.botAdd: $role will be given when a bot joins.
autorole.botRemove: $role ei enään anneta kun botti liittyy.

main.name: user <role name | role mention>
main.value: Set role(s) that will be given when a user joins.

main.name: bot <role name | role mention>
main.value: Set role(s) that will be given when a bot joins.

channel.description: Set which channels new, approved, denied, potential, and invalid suggestions will get sent to.

submit.description: Set which channel that suggestion will only be allow to be sent from.
submit.set: Suggestions will only be allow to be sent from $channel
submit.disable: Suggestions can now be sent from any channel.

dm.on: A DM will get sent to the user of a suggestion when the suggestion gets approved, denied, potentialed, or invalidated, etc.
dm.off: Users will not longer get DMs about suggestions.

reaction.on: Emojis will get reacted to new suggestions.
reaction.off: Emojis will no longer get reacted to new suggestions.

emojis.description: Set the emojis that will get reacted on new suggestions.
emojis.set: The emojis $emoji1, $emoji2 will get reacted to new suggestions if reactions are turned on.

role.description: Limit managing of suggestions to a certain role.
role.disable: Kuka vain kenellä on "Hallinnoi Palvelinta" voi hyväksyä sekä perua ehdotukset.
role.set: Vain käyttäjät joilla on rooli $role voivat hyväksyä/hylätä ehdotuksia nyt.

main.name: channel <new | approved | denied | invalid | potential> <#channel>
main.value: Aseta mille kanaville uudet, hyväksytyt ja hylätyt ehdotukset tullaan lähettämään.

main.name: lähetä <#channel>
main.value: Limit the sending of suggestions to one channel.

main.name: dm
main.value: Set whether or not users should get a DM about their suggestions.

main.name: reaktio
main.value: Set whether or not emojis should be reacted to new suggestions.

main.name: emojis <emoji> <emoji>
main.value: Set the emojis that will get reacted on new suggestions.

main.name: role <role name | role mention>
main.value: Limit managing of suggestions to a certain role.

remove.help: Added an emoji that will remove a role to the active message.
remove.description: You can add a role when Zira is removing the other role. You have to use a comma to separate the second role, see below for an example.
remove.limit: You have reached the limit of 6 remove roles. You can get unlimited remove and toggled roles by [donating](https://zira.ovh/premium)
remove.removeAdd: $role1 will be removed and $role2 will be given

submit.noChannel: There is no suggestion channel. Please set one.

maybe.success: The suggestion has been potentially approved.

invalid.success: The suggestion has been marked as invalid.

log.set: Whenever someone reacts to get a role, it will be logged to
log.giveRemove: <@$user> reacted $emoji to remove <@&$role1> and to get <@&$role2>

prefix.error: Aseta prefix joka on 1-10 merkkiä pitkä sekä sisältää yhden näistä merkeistä:  `.` `/` `?` `[` `]` `\` `<` `>` `-` `=` `+` `*` `^` `$` `!`.

colors.none: No roles were created, as there are already color roles.

leave.placeholders:
$user ~~-~~ käyttäjänimi
$mention ~~-~~ käyttäjän maininta
$guild ~~-~~ palvelimen nimi
$membercount ~~-~~ uusi jäsen määrä
leave.channelSet: Leave messages will get sent to
leave.channelDisable: Leave messages will no longer get sent.
leave.messagePick: Remove a message below by doing **z/leave remove ID**

main.name: channel <#channel | disable>
main.value: Set the channel messages will get sent to when a user leaves.

main.name: lisää <message>
main.value: Add a message to send. You can have multiple message for a random message when a user leaves.

main.name: poista <ID>
main.value: Remove a message that has been set.

join.placeholders:
$user ~~-~~ käyttäjänimi
$mention ~~-~~ käyttäjän maininta
$guild ~~-~~ palvelimen nimi
$membercount ~~-~~ uusi jäsen määrä
join.channelSet: Join messages will get sent to
join.channelDisable: Join messages will no longer get sent.
join.messagePick: Remove a message below by doing **z/join remove ID**

main.name: channel <#channel | disable>
main.value: Set the channel messages will get sent to when a user joins.

main.name: lisää <message>
main.value: Add a message to send. You can have multiple message for a random message when a user joins.

main.name: poista <ID>
main.value: Remove a message that has been set.

lang.translate: Jos haluat Ziran kielellä, joka ei ole luettelossa, voit auttaa kääntämään Ziraa [Crowdin](https://translate.zira.ovh)

vote.description:
You can vote for Zira below. Right now, there are no rewards, but there is a reward system in the works for the future.
Your votes will be stored for use if you vote now, and will be useable when the system is implemented, so all current votes will count.
You can vote [here]($link)!

rooms.title: Private Rooms Setup!
rooms.description: Don't sync permissions if you move the channel to a category. I'll need the permission `Manage Channels` to create and delete private rooms.
